BUSINESS CONSULTANT AGREEMENT

And

{{doc.salutation or "Mr/Ms"}}. {{doc.employee_name}}, whose address is {{doc.custom_permanent_address_line_1}} {{doc.custom_permanent_address_line_2}} {{doc.custom_permanent_address_line_3 or ''}} {{doc.custom_permanent_city}}-{{doc.custom_permanent_zip_code}} {{doc.custom_permanent_state}}, referred to as "Consultant."

1. Consultation Services.

The company hereby employs the consultant to perform the following services in accordance with the terms and conditions set forth in this agreement:

Service Standard Development & Customer Delight:

  • The consultant will attend service complaints (breakdown/Preventive/Installation) for below mentioned territory.
  • Carry out regular service operations/calls across above locations
  • Monitor service complaint calls received
  • Ensure repair within the decided timeline metric
  • Assist team if they need technical inputs Pan India basis
  • Ensure maximum uptime of instruments with minimum logical expense
  • Review of Monthly escalation report of High-End Instruments with NSM/ GM Service and submit plan to resolve.
  • for critical calls, if required he has to travel across PAN India

Revenue Generation:

  • Helping hand in achieving the company’s Service targets of HE instruments --??
  • Responsible in terms of creating value for the services provides and ensuring that the customer views for our support activities as a positive differentiating factor and is convinced to invest in the proposed contracts.

Team Trainings

  • To provide technical training to existing and new engineers.
  • Maintenance training of service team for less deployed instruments Milkoscan FT+, FT-2, BactoScan, ProFOSS, Food Scan and Cattel feed instruments.

2. Reporting

You will be reporting to Mr. Virendra Chaudhary, RSM-West, for HE instruments for your routine coordination. However, you can also contact Mr. Harish Rathore or Mr. Hemant Gurav for any critical cases, and vice versa.

3. Terms of Agreement.

This agreement will begin on {{format_ordinal_date(doc.date_of_joining)}} and will end on {{format_ordinal_date(doc.custom_probation_end_date)}}. Either party may cancel this agreement on 30 days’ notice to the other party in writing, by certified mail or personal delivery.

Based on the review of service provided, organization may propose to renew contract further.

4. Place Where Services Will Be Rendered.

The deputation location will be {{doc.custom_work_location}}. However, the consultant will handle the service complaints for breakdown/Preventive/Installation for below mentioned territory.

In addition, the consultant will perform services on the telephone and at other such places as designated by the company to perform these services in accordance with this agreement.

5. Payment to Consultant.

{% if doc.custom_salary_structure_based_on == "CTC Based" %} {% set monthly_salary = doc.ctc %} {%else %} {% set monthly_salary = doc.custom_gross_salary %} {% endif %}

The consultant will be paid at the rate of Rs.{{monthly_salary}} /- per month. However, the consultant will be paid at least Rs.{{monthly_salary}} /- minus TDS applicable per month regardless of the amount of time spent in accordance with this agreement.

Consultant will be eligible to claim Travel allowance and accommodation configured under company employee policy for Grade {{doc.grade}}. Consultant will have to submit your travel vouchers as per company policy and adhere the processes for claim accordingly.

6. Independent Contractor.

Both the company and the consultant agree that the consultant will act as an independent contractor in the performance of its duties under this contract. Accordingly, the consultant shall be responsible for payment of all taxes including central, State and local taxes arising out of the consultants' fees in accordance with this contract.

7. Confidential Information.

The consultant agrees that any information received by the consultant during any furtherance of the consultant's obligations in accordance with this contract, which concerns the personal, financial or other affairs of the company, will be treated by the consultant in full confidence and will not be revealed to any other persons, firms or organizations.

8. Employment of Others.

The company may, from time to time, request that the consultant arrange for the services of others. All costs to the consultant for those services will be paid by the company but in no event shall the consultant employ others without the prior authorization of the company.

9. Signatures.

Both the company and the consultant has read and agreed to the above contract.
